subject: Re: [junit] Plz can anybody help me ? by replying that is it possible to test a java script using junit test case
msgSnippet: Hi, ... Why not just throw the JavaScript away and you re done? This is a serious question: if your test has problems, you most likely also lock users out.
messageBody:
Hi,

> I am trying to test my application with junit testing but in first
> page it self there is a submit button , and in body tag a javascript
> function is there so when ener i am tring to click the submit button
> it calls the java script and my results are failing....

Why not just throw the JavaScript away and you're done?
This is a serious question: if your test has problems, you most likely also
lock users out.

Robert
